decision_conditions: Some of the alterations sought are aspects already discharged under Condition 3(Approval of Details - external materials) and Condition 10(Privacy Screen) of the original consent P0809.19. These conditions were not included in the application form and insufficient information was provided relating to the material. Insufficient information has been provided with regard to the signage.
Therefore, based on the above insufficient information has been provided to determine if the alterations sought are non-material amendments.
description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission ref P0809.19 dated 31/08/2019 to allow Replacement of the existing timber shop front window to an aluminium-framed shopfront (to match existing), Timber railing and privacy screens amended to glass and opaque glass screens, Balcony steel column posts to rear balcony, New shop front signage on front elevation, Front elevation window to new commercial space reduced in size, Bathroom window reduced in size, Amended render colour to commercial building (Single floor side extension to ground floor to enlarge the existing commercial (A1) use and two storey side extension for residential use (C3) comprising 1 x 1-bed and 1 x 2 bed units.)
